name: Discord.js Pack

blackCards.text: What will finally make hydrabolt release Discord.js v12?
With the banning of matmen, the Discord.js server celebrated by _.
Discord.js is so overrated, I'd rather use _.
If the new Discord.js version doesn't allow me to _, I'll literally jump off a bridge.
Finally! I can send _ to Discord!
That moment when you realize Discord is just Skype but with _.

whiteCards: Discord.
The forever delayed release of Discord.js v12.
A noob who thinks their if/else message handler is a bot framework.
A meme pinging of b1nzy that results in a deleted account.
Selfbots that respond to every message with "Pong!".
hydrabolt.
Nomsy.
Crawl.
The banning of matmen.
A new version of Discord.js that breaks everything.
Another month-long break for hydrabolt.
Another toxic statement from Recchan.
Yet another Gus code screenshot.
Finally transferring Discord.js away from hydrabolt.
Another dumb ban appeal from an entitled 12-year-old.
A useless bot the server doesn't need but can't live without. Like this bot.
A noob who thinks Java and JavaScript are the same thing.
A fork of Commando that's actually customizable.
Kyra complaining about yet another performance issue.
The ability to send HTML to Discord.
The realization that Discord actually isn't better than Skype or TeamSpeak.
Another ban from Crawl with the reason "annoying".
Another white-named pleb asking to be in this card deck.
Cursing on my Christian Discord server.
Drah falling for a bait from Crawl. Again.
Naming every single user in the server hydrabolt and then complaining about spam.
Discord e-couples who stay in a call while they sleep so they can "sleep together".
Aister's lewd manga collection.
